text: Sons is a 2024 film directed by Gustav MÃ¶ller, known for his previous work "The Guilty." The story centers on Eva, an idealistic prison officer who faces a moral dilemma when a young man from her past is transferred to the prison where she works. The film runs for 1 hour and 40 minutes and has an IMDb rating of 6.4/10.
title: Sons (film)
